title: A Stapler
description:
1 lbs
Allegedly heavy enough to incapacitate the average office worker for life. Thankfully, Strong Guy is not average.

title: His Collection of Cutoffs
description:
10,000 lbs
This collection is so large that he has to pay $300,000/year just to store them. Syed can lift it with ease

title: His Weekly Bulk Orders of Chicken and Rice
description:
weight: unknown
The largest poultry farm in the world is in fact not McDonald’s supplier, but Syed's.

title: His Replica of the UFC Heavyweight Belt
description:
10.45 lbs
Maybe not the heaviest item to lift, but he wears it under his clothes everyday - this proves his true muscle stamina

title: The Big Show
description:
383 lbs
This proves his incredible mental discipline - he puts aside the distraction that comes with being in love with the Big Show in order to do what he needs to do.

title: A Coniferous Tree
description:
800 lbs
Syed can rip a tree out of the ground and lift it over his head. It is rumored he does this for his Sunday workouts in Scarborough Crescent Park.

title: An Airbus A380
description:
1,238,998 lbs
When Syed bench presses an Airbus A380, spectators will be able to hear him whispering "and boom" after every rep.

title: Vancouver Island
description:
90,726,500,000 Metric Tons
Syed lifts Vancouver island with such stability the people living there are unaware they are moving.

title: The Pentagon
description:
weight: [redacted]
Due to a direct government order, we are unable to disclose the exact details of how Syed lifts the Pentagon.

title: Lizzo
description:
175 lbs
According to Syed, 175 lbs is an underestimate. Lizzo can be carried with ease on Syed back, he has been seen climbing trees while carrying her.

title: Mjölnir
description:
A mass so large the numbers cannot be represented using earths units of measurements
Only two people other than Thor have had the strength to lift Mrunal; Syed, and his strong guy equal, Chris Evans.
